subject: JDOM and Junit
msgSnippet: I m running into a very bizzare problem.  I have a method on a class of mine that creates a jdom document from a file and gets the root element name.  when i
messageBody:
I'm running into a very bizzare problem. I have a method on a class
of mine that creates a jdom document from a file and gets the root
element name. when i run my test using the junit.awtui.TestRunner it
fails with a vague SAXBuilder.build error. when i run my test using
the junit.textui.TestRunner it runs fine.

The only reason I found this is because I kept running into problems
on something I know was working yesterday. But yesterday I was not
using Junit to do the test. I had my own test class. So I went back
and ran my test class... it still worked.

Any ideas as to why this is happening?

Thanks,
Liz
